nodes.text: A Sailfish was a type of small transport produced by the Mon Calamari Shipyards.
The class was in use following the Yuuzhan Vong War of the galaxy.

During the Swarm War, Squib war profiteers Emala, Grees and Sligh performed their business from a ship of this class, the Real Deal. Han later arranged for the smugglers Jae Juun and Tarfang to have a Sailfish.
